txt.en: You stand before the sacred Dhûrghud of Drû Bhûta
You think about the years of anguish the Woses have endured
'The Dhûrghud will see you remain safe in these woods, each time you pass through. You a kind [placeholder].'
You meditate, clearing your mind of the conflicts both behind and ahead of you
You relax yourself under the sacred Dhûrghud of Drû Bhûta
The sacred Dhûrghud tree is located in Drû Bhûta.\n\nYou should pay your respects to Bhai-buri-Ghân by the Dhûrghud.
Ghân-buri-Ghân is in Drû Bhûta.\n\nYou should speak with Ghân-buri-Ghân.
The sacred Dhûrghud tree is located in Drû Bhûta.\n\nYou should pay your respects to Bhai-buri-Ghân by the Dhûrghud.
<rgb=#FF0000>Mourn</rgb> the loss of Bhai-buri-Ghân by the Dhûrghud
With Bhai-buri-Ghân's spirit at rest, Ghân-buri-Ghân asks you to participate in a Drúedain ritual.
<rgb=#FF0000>Meditate</rgb> to clear your mind under the sacred Dhûrghud
'Spirit of Bhai-buri-Ghân resting under shade of the Dhûrghud. You must now thank the Dhûrghud for watching over you. The tree protects Drúedain and now protects you.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Meditate</rgb> the clear your mind under the sacred Dhûrghud
